```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library("papaja")
r_refs("r-references.bib")
library(haven)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(apaTables)
library(rio)
```

```{r global options}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE,
                      eval = FALSE)
```

```{r data import}
stride <- read_sav("data/project_stride_data.sav") %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() 
head(stride)

stridy <- stride %>%
  filter(sexori <= 6) %>% 
    select(sexori,
           age,
           ethnic,
           gender,
           chr_gen_2,
           perwellb_2,
           dis_d_total,
           connect)
head(stridy)

```

```{r tidy data}
stridy_wide <- stridy %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = sexori,
    values_from = ethnic
  )

stridy_long <- stridy_wide %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = 7:12,
    names_to = "sexori",
    values_to = "ethnic"
  )

```
```{r}
#stridy %>% 
 # sexori <- factor(stridy$sexori,
  #                 levels = c("Gay",
   #                "Lesbian",
    #               "Queer",
     #              "Bisexual",
      #             "Homosexual",
       #            "Other - LGB")) %>% 
  #fct_inorder()

sexori <- stridy %>% 
  mutate(sexori = as.factor(sexori))

stridy %>% 
  group_by(sexori) %>% 
  characterize(sexori) %>% 
  summarize(mean_disc = mean(dis_d_total)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(sexori, mean_disc)) +
  geom_col() +
  labs(title = "Everyday discrimination experiences",
       subtitle = "Based on sexual orientation") +
  xlab("Sexual orientation") +
  ylab("Average number of everyday discrimination experiences")

```
